sentence.Network_en: The hospital may restrict bookings to people living locally.

sentence.Network_en: The curriculum was to be decided locally.
sentence.Network_cn: 课程安排将由地方决定。

sentence.Network_en: New industries demanded skilled labour not available locally.
sentence.Network_cn: 新行业所需的技术工人在当地是找不到的。

entry.tran: 本地的；本地的；地方性的
entry.def: Local means existing in or belonging to the area where you live, or to the area that you are talking about.

example.ex: We'd better check on the match in the local paper...
example.tran: 我们最好在本地报纸上查一下这场比赛。

example.ex: Some local residents joined the students' protest...
example.tran: 当地一些居民也加入了学生的抗议行列。

entry.def: Local government is elected by people in one area of a country and controls aspects such as education, housing, and transport within that area.

example.ex: Education comprises two-thirds of all local council spending.
example.tran: 教育占地方市政会全部开支的三分之二。

example.ex: ...the controversial system of local taxation known as the poll tax.
example.tran: 被称为“人头税”的备受争议的地方税制

entry.tran: (常去的)邻近小酒馆，本地酒吧
entry.def: Your local is a pub which is near where you live and where you often go for a drink.

example.ex: The Black Horse is my local.

entry.def: A local anaesthetic or condition affects only a small area of your body.

example.ex: An injection of local anaesthetic is usually given first to numb the area.
example.tran: 通常先打局麻，以使该部位失去知觉。

means.word_mean: 2. to a restricted area of the body;

auth_sentence.content: Labour councillors locally are bitterly opposed to the decision.

auth_sentence.content: But it's impossible to do it just locally.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it's impossible to do it just locally.

means.word_mean: 在附近;在本地;当地地；本地地

sentences.en: fruit and vegetables that are produced locally

sentences.cn: 在当地很有权势的土地所有者

sentences.en: This is all locally grown produce.
Most of the workers will be recruited locally.
sentences.cn: 大多数工人都会在本地招募。

sentences.en: Ski equipment can be hired locally.
sentences.cn: 滑雪器材可以到当地租用。

sentences.en: The dumping of foreign cotton blocked outlets for locally grown cotton.
sentences.cn: 外国棉花的倾销阻滞了当地生产的棉花的销路。

sentences.en: Most of the country will be dry, but there may be some rain locally.
sentences.cn: 国内大部分地方将是干燥天气,但局部地区可能下点雨。
